attributes.action: Stop all benefits to those capable of work but haven't contributed at least 5 years worth of National Insurance Contributions
attributes.additional_details:
We petition the Government to stop all benefits to those who are capable of work but choose not to and haven't contributed at least 5 years worth of National Insurance Contributions.
There is a generation of lazy good for nothings out there who believe they are entitled to live purely off the benefits system without contributing one iota to British Society.
Some people get more money on the befits system than others who go out to work and don't leach off the country.
It's time the country got it's priorities right and reward only those who contribute to society and not those who just stay at home all day and do nothing except breed to get even more benefits.
